props.title: Used disk space
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.cluster.diskUsedInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Total disk space
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.cluster.diskTotalInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Total RAM
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.cluster.memoryTotalInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Used RAM by data
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.cluster.memoryUsedByDataInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Used RAM
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.cluster.memoryUsedInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: The number of auto failovers
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.cluster.autoFailoverCount`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Indicates if failover is enabled
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.cluster.autoFailoverEnabled`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Maximum number of buckets
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.cluster.maximumBucketCount`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: The percentage level within the database at which compaction occurs
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.cluster.databaseFragmentationThreshold`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: The percentage level within indexes at which compaction occurs
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.cluster.indexFragmentationThreshold`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: The percentage of fragmentation within all the view index files at which compaction is triggered
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.cluster.viewFragmentationThreshold`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
